name: XiaoZhi-ESP32-FullSuite
postCreateCommand:
sudo apt update &&
    sudo apt install -y wget flex bison gperf python3-pip python3-venv ninja-build ccache libffi-dev libssl-dev autoconf automake libtool pkg-config qemu-system-x86 netcat-openbsd &&
    mkdir -p ~/esp &&
    cd ~/esp &&
    git clone --recursive https://github.com/espressif/esp-idf.git &&
    cd esp-idf &&
    git checkout release/v5.2 &&
    ./install.sh esp32s3 &&
    echo 'source ~/esp/esp-idf/export.sh >/dev/null 2>&1' >> ~/.bashrc &&

    echo 'Cloning XiaoZhi firmware...' &&
    cd ~ &&
    git clone https://github.com/78/xiaozhi-esp32.git || true &&

    echo 'Installing Web Debug server...' &&
    npm install -g http-server &&

    echo 'DONE: Full environment is ready.'
